text: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha kālāmā doso purisassa ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati hitāya vā ahitāya vā ti
edit: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha kālāmā doso purisassa ajjhattaṃ uppajjamāno uppajjati hitāya vā ahitāya vā ti?

translations.transtext: How do you think about that, Kālāmas? [When] arising inside a person, does anger arise for usefulness or uselessness?
